title: Sleep biomarkers of sudden unexpected death in epilepsy: Data from the Kv1.1 mouse model.
abstract: Sudden Unexpected Death in Epilepsy (SUDEP) is a leading cause of epilepsy-related mortality, often occurring during sleep and lacking reliable predictive biomarkers. Here we used the Kv1.1
